alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida through 345 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Blountstown, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Clarksville, Red Oak, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Chason, Chipola, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Willis, Frink, Kinard, Blountstown Airport, Hugh Creek, Broad Branch, Chipola Park and Durham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
